## Project Overview

| Aspect | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Project** | Synkra AIOS (AI-Orchestrated System for Full Stack Development) |
| **Version** | 3.11.3 |
| **Framework** | AIOS-FullStack |
| **Primary Language** | JavaScript (86%) |
| **Secondary Language** | TypeScript (14%) |
| **Testing Framework** | Jest + Mocha |
| **Configuration** | YAML (core-config.yaml) + .env |
| **Node.js** | >=18.0.0 |
| **License** | MIT |

---

## Project Structure

```
aios-core/
├── bin/                          # CLI executables (3 files)
├── .aios-core/                   # Core framework
│   ├── core/                     # 15 subsystems (121 files)
│   ├── cli/                      # 30+ CLI commands
│   ├── development/              # Agents, tasks, workflows
│   ├── infrastructure/           # Integrations & tools
│   ├── product/                  # Product definitions
│   ├── quality/                  # Quality gates
│   ├── presets/                  # Technology presets
│   └── manifests/                # Install manifests
├── apps/
│   ├── dashboard/                # Next.js observability UI
│   └── monitor-server/           # Monitoring backend
├── packages/
│   └── installer/                # AIOS installer (v3.2.0)
├── tools/
│   └── health-dashboard/         # Health monitoring (Vite/React)
├── docs/                         # Documentation (3,769 files)
├── tests/                        # Test suite (152 files)
├── scripts/                      # Utility scripts
├── squads/                       # Expansion packs (empty)
└── .github/                      # CI/CD (11 workflows)
```

## Architecture Patterns

| Pattern | Implementation |
|---------|---------------|
| CLI-First | All features available via CLI before UI |
| Agent-Based Orchestration | 13 agents with distinct responsibilities |
| Story-Driven Development | 416+ stories tracking all work |
| Workflow Templates | 13 YAML-based reusable workflows |
| Health-Check System | 49 checks with auto-healing |
| Event-Driven | Dashboard integration via event emission |
| Constitution | Formal principles with enforcement gates |
| Quality Gates | Pre-deployment validation system |
